019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.StaticCaption;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
025import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
026import com.plotsquared.core.player.MetaDataAccess;
027import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlayerMetaDataKeys;
028import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotId;
032import com.plotsquared.core.plot.schematic.Schematic;
033import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.SchematicHandler;
036import com.plotsquared.core.util.TimeUtil;
037import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal;
038import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.TaskManager;
039import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
040import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
041import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
042import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
043
044import java.net.MalformedURLException;
045import java.net.URL;
046import java.util.Collections;
047import java.util.List;
048
049@CommandDeclaration(command = "load",
050        aliases = "restore",
051        category = CommandCategory.SCHEMATIC,
052        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
053        permission = "plots.load",
054        usage = "/plot load")
055public class Load extends SubCommand {
056
057    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
058    private final SchematicHandler schematicHandler;
059
060    @Inject
061    public Load(
062            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
063            final @NonNull SchematicHandler schematicHandler
064    ) {
065        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
066        this.schematicHandler = schematicHandler;
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args) {
071        final String world = player.getLocation().getWorldName();
072        if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(world)) {
073            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
074            return false;
075        }
076        final Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
077        if (plot == null) {
078            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
079            return false;
080        }
081        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
082            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_unowned"));
083            return false;
084        }
085        if (!plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
086                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_COMMAND_LOAD)) {
087            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
088            return false;
089        }
090        if (plot.getRunning() > 0) {
091            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.wait_for_timer"));
092            return false;
093        }
094
095        try (final MetaDataAccess<List<String>> metaDataAccess =
096                     player.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_SCHEMATICS)) {
097            if (args.length != 0) {
098                if (args.length == 1) {
099                    List<String> schematics = metaDataAccess.get().orElse(null);
100                    if (schematics == null) {
101                        // No schematics found:
102                        player.sendMessage(
103                                TranslatableCaption.of("web.load_null"),
104                                TagResolver.resolver("command", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot load")))
105                        );
106                        return false;
107                    }
108                    String schematic;
109                    try {
110                        schematic = schematics.get(Integer.parseInt(args[0]) - 1);
111                    } catch (Exception ignored) {
112                        // use /plot load <index>
113                        player.sendMessage(
114                                TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.not_valid_number"),
115                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("(1, " + schematics.size() + ')')))
116                        );
117                        return false;
118                    }
119                    final URL url;
120                    try {
121                        url = new URL(Settings.Web.URL + "saves/" + player.getUUID() + '/' + schematic);
122                    } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
123                        e.printStackTrace();
124                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("web.load_failed"));
125                        return false;
126                    }
127                    plot.addRunning();
128                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("working.generating_component"));
129                    TaskManager.runTaskAsync(() -> {
130                        Schematic taskSchematic = this.schematicHandler.getSchematic(url);
131                        if (taskSchematic == null) {
132                            plot.removeRunning();
133                            player.sendMessage(
134                                    TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_invalid"),
135                                    TagResolver.resolver(
136                                            "reason",
137                                            Tag.inserting(Component.text("non-existent or not in gzip format"))
138                                    )
139                            );
140                            return;
141                        }
142                        PlotArea area = plot.getArea();
143                        this.schematicHandler.paste(
144                                taskSchematic,
145                                plot,
146                                0,
147                                area.getMinBuildHeight(),
148                                0,
149                                false,
150                                player,
151                                new RunnableVal<>() {
152                                    @Override
153                                    public void run(Boolean value) {
154                                        plot.removeRunning();
155                                        if (value) {
156                                            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_paste_success"));
157                                        } else {
158                                            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_paste_failed"));
159                                        }
160                                    }
161                                }
162                        );
163                    });
164                    return true;
165                }
166                plot.removeRunning();
167                player.sendMessage(
168                        TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
169                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot load <index>")))
170                );
171                return false;
172            }
173
174            // list schematics
175
176            List<String> schematics = metaDataAccess.get().orElse(null);
177            if (schematics == null) {
178                plot.addRunning();
179                TaskManager.runTaskAsync(() -> {
180                    List<String> schematics1 = this.schematicHandler.getSaves(player.getUUID());
181                    plot.removeRunning();
182                    if ((schematics1 == null) || schematics1.isEmpty()) {
183                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("web.load_failed"));
184                        return;
185                    }
186                    metaDataAccess.set(schematics1);
187                    displaySaves(player);
188                });
189            } else {
190                displaySaves(player);
191            }
192        }
193        return true;
194    }
195
196    public void displaySaves(PlotPlayer<?> player) {
197        try (final MetaDataAccess<List<String>> metaDataAccess =
198                     player.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_SCHEMATICS)) {
199            List<String> schematics = metaDataAccess.get().orElse(Collections.emptyList());
200            for (int i = 0; i < Math.min(schematics.size(), 32); i++) {
201                try {
202                    String schematic = schematics.get(i).split("\\.")[0];
203                    String[] split = schematic.split("_");
204                    if (split.length < 5) {
205                        continue;
206                    }
207                    String time = TimeUtil.secToTime((System.currentTimeMillis() / 1000) - Long.parseLong(split[0]));
208                    String world = split[1];
209                    PlotId id = PlotId.fromString(split[2] + ';' + split[3]);
210                    String size = split[4];
211                    String color = "<dark_aqua>";
212                    player.sendMessage(StaticCaption.of("<dark_gray>[</dark_gray><gray>" + (i + 1) + "</gray><dark_aqua>] </dark_aqua>" + color + time + "<dark_gray> | </dark_gray>" + color + world + ';' + id
213                            + "<dark_gray> | </dark_gray>" + color + size + 'x' + size));
214                } catch (Exception e) {
215                    e.printStackTrace();
216                }
217            }
218            player.sendMessage(
219                    TranslatableCaption.of("web.load_list"),
220                    TagResolver.resolver("command", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot load #")))
221            );
222        }
223    }
224
225}
